channel.title: Setting-up Server, Need Help
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt]Hey, Im currently making a server but have trouble getting it online. I have port forwarded and here's proof that the ports are open...[/size][/center] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2266234/PFProff.jpg[/img]
Have set-up no-ip DUC and is set up... [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2266275/ServerOnline.jpg[/img] The IP is set-up in GUI + Client [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2266280/GUI.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2266281/Client.jpg[/img]
Once i run it i get 'Error Connecting to Sever [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2266284/Running.jpg[/img]
[center][size=24pt]Thanks all help is appreciated[/size][/center]

item.title: Setting-up Server, Need Help
item.dc:creator: @Sebbb Sebbb
item.description:
@Sebbb wrote:

Thanks, i’ll be sure to try this with a friend

Read full topic

item.title: Setting-up Server, Need Help
item.dc:creator: @sume sume
item.description:
@sume wrote:

You can not connect to your own ip address. Others connect to your no-ip address, you have to use localhost ip which is 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0
and if you got uTorrent and it is on so it can stop you from logging in (idk why but it’s just so)
Hope it helped.

-Sume

Read full topic
